name: ff
tagline: basic scripts meant to transform and analyze Flat Files (plain-text tabular data)
body:
# ff
flat file data manipulation and analysis tools written in [python](http://python.org/)

## Quick-Start Example
`
#install ff
ff summary myfile.tsv.gz
ff header myfile.csv.gz
ff align myfile.tsv
...
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
